column1: Figure 1: Average UK house prices fell in the 12 months to December 2023 (provisional estimate)
Annual house price rates of change for all dwellings, UK, January 2006 to December 2023

column2:
1.  Estimates are not seasonally adjusted. 

2.  The [HMLR's UK House Price Index (HPI) release on GOV.UK ](https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/uk-house-price-index-reports)is available to download. 

3.  Volatility in 2021 and 2022 reflects house price movements around changes in Stamp Duty Land Tax in 2021.
